cleaned_text: Last Updated: January 1, 2023 Natural Medicine And Detox, Inc. Is committed to protecting your privacy. This Statement of Privacy applies to Natural Medicine And Detox website and governs data collection and usage. By using Natural Medicine And Detox website, you consent to the data practices described in this statement. Natural Medicine And Detox, Inc. will make every effort to ensure the information on this website up to date and correct, however we make no guarantees of any kind. This website Privacy Policy specifically apples to Natural Medicine And Detox, Inc. website and your interactions with it. We may at anytime, change/update our Privacy Policy. Natural Medicine And Detox Inc. complies with the Health Insurance and Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA). Collection of your Personal Information Natural Medicine And Detox Inc. collects personal information such as your email address, name, home or work address, home and or cell phone number; as well as anonymous demographic information such as your ZIP code, age, gender, preferences and interests. - Collects information from you when you fill out an online form. - When ordering or registering on Natural Medicine And Detox websites and or Newsletter, as you may be asked to enter your name or email address. However, you may view our website anonymously. - Collecting information from your computer hardware and software can include: access times, your IP address, browser type, domain name, but not limited to. Use of your Personal Information Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways: - To personalize your experience and to better respond to your individual needs - To improve upon our website - To improve upon our marketing strategy - To inform you of products or services available at Natural Medicine And Detox our affiliates and partners - To conduct surveys about your opinion of current services and potential services that we may offer Use of Cookies Natural medicine And Detox Inc. website uses "cookies" to personalize your online experience and to keep track of advertisements and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction. These service providers are not permitted to use the information collected on Natural Medicine And Detox behalf except to help us conduct and improve its business. Cookies are uniquely assigned to you and can only be read by a web server. Most Web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can choose to decline cookies. Protect your Personal Information Natural Medicine And Detox Inc. secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. Our Uses and Disclosures We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses. - We can use your health information and share it with other professionals who are treating you. - We can use and share your health information to bill and get payment from health plans or other entities such as insurance companies. - We can use them for workers' compensation claims - We can use them for law enforcement purposes or officials Discrimination is Against the Law Natural Medicine And Detox Inc complies with applicable Federal civil rights laws and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, disability, or sex. Hippocrates Wellness does not exclude people or treat them differently because of race, color, national origin, age, disability, or sex. Online Website Privacy Policy Only This online Website Privacy Policy applies only to information collected through Natural Medicine And Detox website and not to information collected offline. Your Consent By using Natural Medicine And Detox web site, you consent to Natural Medicine And Detox Website Privacy Policy. Contact Information Natural Medicine And Detox Inc. welcomes your comments regarding this Statement of Privacy. If you have comments or suggestions, please email us using the contact form to protect us
